files.package.json:
{
  "name": "bancapp",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "main": "index.ts",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node -r dotenv/config node_modules/expo/bin/cli.js start",
    "android": "expo start --android",
    "ios": "expo start --ios",
    "web": "expo start --web"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@expo/metro-runtime": "~4.0.1",
    "@react-native-async-storage/async-storage": "1.23.1",
    "@react-native-firebase/app": "^21.12.0",
    "@react-native-firebase/auth": "^21.12.0",
    "@react-native-firebase/firestore": "^21.12.0",
    "@react-native-firebase/storage": "^21.12.0",
    "@react-navigation/bottom-tabs": "^7.2.1",
    "@react-navigation/native": "^7.0.15",
    "@react-navigation/native-stack": "^7.2.1",
    "@react-navigation/stack": "^7.1.2",
    "@types/firebase": "^2.4.32",
    "expo": "~52.0.37",
    "expo-asset": "~11.0.4",
    "expo-font": "~13.0.4",
    "expo-linear-gradient": "~14.0.2",
    "expo-status-bar": "~2.0.1",
    "firebase": "^11.4.0",
    "lucide-react": "^0.477.0",
    "react": "18.3.1",
    "react-dom": "18.3.1",
    "react-hook-form": "^7.54.2",
    "react-native": "0.76.7",
    "react-native-safe-area-context": "4.12.0",
    "react-native-screens": "~4.4.0",
    "react-native-web": "~0.19.13",
    "react-native-webview": "^13.13.4",
    "yup": "^1.6.1",
    "zustand": "^5.0.3"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.25.2",
    "@eslint/js": "^9.22.0",
    "@types/jest": "^29.5.14",
    "@types/react": "~18.3.12",
    "@types/react-native": "^0.72.8",
    "@types/react-test-renderer": "^19.0.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.26.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.26.0",
    "eslint": "^9.22.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.37.4",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^5.2.0",
    "globals": "^16.0.0",
    "jest": "^29.7.0",
    "prettier": "^3.5.3",
    "react-test-renderer": "^18.3.1",
    "ts-jest": "^29.2.6",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.26.1"
  },
  "private": true
}
files.tsconfig.json:
{
  "extends": "expo/tsconfig.base",
  "compilerOptions": {
    "strict": true,
    "jsx": "react-native",
    "target": "es2017",
    "lib": ["es2017", "dom", "dom.iterable", "esnext"],
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "noImplicitAny": false,
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "types": [
      "node",
      "jest",
      "@react-native-firebase/app",
      "@react-native-firebase/auth",
      "@react-native-firebase/firestore",
      "@react-native-firebase/storage",
      "@types/react",
      "@types/react-native"
    ],
    "noEmit": true,
    "baseUrl": "./",
    "paths": {
      "@/*": ["./src/*"]
    }
  },
  "exclude": [
    "node_modules",
    "babel.config.js",
    "metro.config.js",
    "jest.config.js"
  ]
}
